query: What is the species of cockroach found in Spain?

topRanked.articleTitle: COMPARATIVE ANATOMY OF THE INSECT TRACHEAL SYSTEM PART 1: INTRODUCTION, APTERYGOTES, PALEOPTERA, POLYNEOPTERA
topRanked.articleAuthor: Herhold, Hollister W, Davis, Steven R, Degrey, Samuel P & Grimaldi, David A
topRanked.speciesDesc: Gromphadorinha portentosa is a species of hissing cockroach that belongs to the family Blaberidae. It is native to Madagascar and is known for its distinctive physiology, which includes the fourth spiracle being the source of the hiss. The complex tracheal architecture of Gromphadorhina is also notable, with only spiracles and major tracheae labeled in the provided images.
